--[[ 250802003 pain1 250802004 pain2 #공격스킬 250802010 페이즈 전환 250802011 앞으로 점프 250802012 잡기 250802013 발구르기 250802014 크게 발구르기 250802040 돌 떨어트리기 (사방작음) 250802041 돌 떨어트리기 (원) 250802042 돌 떨어트리기 (사방큼) 250802016 지진 발사 #연타공격 250802020 전방 휘두르기 1타 250802021 전방 휘두르기 2연타 250802022 전방 휘두르기 3연타 250802023 빠름 전방 휘두르기 1타 250802024 빠름 전방 휘두르기 2연타 250802025 빠름 전방 휘두르기 3연타 --]] function NPC_508020:Init(NPCID)
NPC_508020.UD_PAIN1 = 1 -- 주기적인 Pain을 위한 누적 데미지. NPC_508020.UD_PAIN2 = 2 -- 큰 Pain을 위한 누적 데미지. NPC_508020.UD_DATASIZE = 2
NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, NPC_508020.UD_DATASIZE );
NPC_508020.LIMIT_PAIN1 = NPC_508020.MaxHP * 0.1 NPC_508020.LIMIT_PAIN2 = NPC_508020.MaxHP * 0.6
NPC_508020.BPARTS_1 = 1 NPC_508020.BPARTS_2 = 2 NPC_508020.BPARTS_3 = 3 NPC_508020.BPARTS_4 = 4
NPC_508020.MODE_DAFAULT = 0 NPC_508020.MODE_STATUE = 1
NPC_508020.TALENT_PAIN1 = 250802003 NPC_508020.TALENT_PAIN2 = 250802004
NPC_508020.TALENT_Rockslide1 = 250802040 -- 돌 떨어트리기(사방작음) NPC_508020.TALENT_Rockslide2 = 250802041 -- 돌 떨어트리기(사방큼) NPC_508020.TALENT_Rockslide3 = 250802042 -- 돌 떨어트리기(원) --NPC_508020.TALENT_Quake = 250802016 -- 지진 발사 NPC_508020.TALENT_Grip = 250802012 -- 잡기
NPC_508020.DUMMY_ID = 508021 NPC_508020.DUMMY_TALENT_Rockslide_1 = 250802100 NPC_508020.DUMMY_TALENT_Rockslide_2 = 250802101 NPC_508020.DUMMY_TALENT_Rockslide_3 = 250802102
NPC_508020.BuffIdArmBug = 41203
-- 여자 석상 NPC_508020.STATUE_SpawnID = 5080221 NPC_508020.STATUE_COUNT = 2 NPC_508020.STATUE_WakeUp = 250802211
end
function NPC_508020:OnSpawn(Spawn) this:GainBuff( NPC_508020.BuffIdArmBug ) end
function NPC_508020:bugdespawn( ThisNPC, Enemy ) this:RemoveBuff( NPC_508020.BuffIdArmBug ) end
function NPC_508020:OnStartWakeStatue( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog("NPC_520010:OnStartWakeStatue()\n")
local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion
for i = 0, NPC_508020.STATUE_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_508020.STATUE_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_508020.STATUE_WakeUp ) end -- for end
function NPC_508020:OnStartRockslide_1( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Dummy = Field:GetNPC( NPC_508020.DUMMY_ID )
-- GLog("NPC_508020:OnStartRockslide_1() "..Dummy:GetCurrentTalent().."\n")
if not Dummy or Dummy:GetCurrentTalent() ~= -1 then return end
Dummy:UseTalentSelf( NPC_508020.DUMMY_TALENT_Rockslide_1 ) end
function NPC_508020:OnStartRockslide_2( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Dummy = Field:GetNPC( NPC_508020.DUMMY_ID )
if not Dummy or Dummy:GetCurrentTalent() ~= -1 then return end
Dummy:UseTalentSelf( NPC_508020.DUMMY_TALENT_Rockslide_2 ) end
function NPC_508020:OnStartRockslide_3( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Dummy = Field:GetNPC( NPC_508020.DUMMY_ID )
if not Dummy or Dummy:GetCurrentTalent() ~= -1 then return end
Dummy:UseTalentSelf( NPC_508020.DUMMY_TALENT_Rockslide_3 ) end
function NPC_508020:OnFinishAndAggroFar( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Target = ThisNPC:Aggro( "far", 0 ) end
function NPC_508020:OnFinishAndAggroRandom( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Target = ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_508020:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() local mode = ThisNPC:GetMode() local Target = HitInfo.Attacker
local painAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN1 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN1, painAcc )
local damageAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN2 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN2, damageAcc )
-- pain 예외 처리. if currentTalent == NPC_508020.TALENT_Rockslide1 or currentTalent == NPC_508020.TALENT_Rockslide2 or currentTalent == NPC_508020.TALENT_Rockslide3 or --currentTalent == NPC_508020.TALENT_Quake or currentTalent == NPC_508020.TALENT_Grip or ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_508020.TALENT_PAIN1 ) or ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_508020.TALENT_PAIN2 ) then return HitInfo end
if damageAcc >= NPC_508020.LIMIT_PAIN2 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN1, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN2, 0 ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_508020.TALENT_PAIN2 ) elseif painAcc >= NPC_508020.LIMIT_PAIN1 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_508020.UD_PAIN1, 0 ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_508020.TALENT_PAIN1 ) if(ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) == false) then ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, Target) elseif (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) == false) then ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, Target) elseif (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) == false) then ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, Target) elseif (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(4) == false) then ThisNPC:BreakPart(4, Target) end end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_508020:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_508020:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_508020:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_508020:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_508020:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, NPC_508020.UD_DATASIZE do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
